name: Go-Kart Racing
description: Go-Kart Racing provides racers with a thrilling go-kart experience. Compete against drivers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 400 Series or later. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio Additional Notes: PS4 Controller Recommended
